# Government Tender Announcement - Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
** Notice ID: PW-__QF-002-29279**
** Tender Title: CH 148/CP140 Post Mission**
** Solicitation Number: W8485-247929/A**
** Notice Date: February 9, 2024**
** Closing Date: February 26, 2024, 2:00 PM EST**

## Brief Overview of the Requirement
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to acquire Laptop - Acoustic Replay and Intelligence Exploitation System (L-ARIES) for the CH148 Cyclone Helicopter and CP140 Aurora Aircraft fleets. The successful supplier will provide seventeen (17) L-ARIES Systems, including fourteen (14) in service and three (3) for spares.

## Contract Award Notice Details
This tender is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), which allows departments to advertise their intention to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier. If no other supplier meets the requirements outlined in the ACAN, the contracting authority may proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

## Selection Criteria
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a Statement of Capabilities that its products and services meet the following requirements:
- Comply with GDMS-C QR-04918 Rev. 1 Laptop - Acoustic Replay and Intelligence Exploitation System (L-ARIES) Proposal (Proprietary) or equivalent.
- Provide technical documents, including L-ARIES Requirements Specifications and Software Configuration Index.
- Be compatible with existing acoustic systems installed on CH148 Cyclone and CP140 Aurora Aircraft.
- Satisfy capability deficiencies and deliver functional capabilities identified in 12 Wing's Statement of Capability Deficiency (SOCD).

## Important Details
- The successful supplier must have a valid registration in the Controlled Goods Program.
- A Security Requirement is associated with this procurement, and suppliers must have a minimum Reliability Status security screening level.
- A statement of capabilities must be submitted by interested suppliers on or before the closing date of this notice.
